sentence.Network_en: He turned to face her for his parting shot. "You're one coldhearted woman, you know that?"
sentence.Network_cn: 他临走时转过身，向她甩下一句“你是个冷漠无情的女人，你知道吗？”

sentence.Network_en: Extravagance and vanity had made him coldhearted and selfish.
sentence.Network_cn: 放荡和虚荣使他变得残忍自私.

entry.tran: 无同情心的;铁石心肠的
entry.def: A cold-hearted person does not feel any affection or sympathy towards other people.
